Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1990...
Injured on 8/17/1991 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Minnesota on 5/5/1993 (Going to STL: 1B P. O'Neill, P A. Rincon. Going to MIN: RF J. Burnitz, P J. Shaw, P S. Takatsu, P P. Harnisch)...
Injured on 5/18/1993 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 9/1/1993 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1994, off Moose Haas (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/1994, off Bob Milacki (TEX)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1995, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
